data.title: Good Thai in Ogden
data.text: This is my preferred Thai restaurant in Ogden. They have delicious Pad Thai. It's a hole in the wall but don't be fooled.

data.title: A Happy Find!
data.text: We love Thai food, and were happy to find this place close to our hotel. Spring rolls, Green curry & Pad See Ew: everything was delicious and the service was excellent! Will definitely eat here again on our next visit.

data.title: Best Asian fog in Ogden!
data.text: My wife and my favorite restaurant in Ogden.  Everything I've ever had was excellent but the red curry fried rice is my favorite.  And the staff is extremely friendly.  We've moved away from Ogden this spring, but every time I go back I'm going to here for dinner.

data.title: Great Thai food
data.text: I got the pineapple Thai curry with tofu and then some kids stuff like Mac and cheese, fries and chicken nuggets.  We did take out so did not get the dining experience.  But the food was delicious.  The kids really liked their food, with some good dipping sauces.  and the Mac and cheese had some vegetable sides which my four-year old actually ate.  My pineapple curry was great.  The service was very good and accommodating.  I would definitely return.

data.title: Fresh and inexpensive Thai food
data.text: It was hard not to judge this restaurant as we walked up to it; it's not visually appealing, inside or out, but it is seems well cared for and loved. The wait staff was helpful, and I appreciated how invested our waitress was in the happiness of our friend's little girl. But it's really the food that matters, and in that Bangkok Garden does well. The Pad Thai and Thai Stir-fried were more than worth the cost. I loved how clean and fresh everything tasted. That being said, I'm not a Thai food connoisseur, but I know we'll be back soon.

data.title: Great food and wonderful service
data.text: I saw this restaurant from my room and had a good feeling.  When we arrived we were seated promptly and the girls were really nice.  I ordered the General TSO.  It was the best I have ever had in my life.  The breading melted in my mouth and it tasted out of this world delicious.  I wish I could take a lifetime serving home with me.

data.title: Good food, great service/staff
data.text:
Well, there are elephants everywhere, which is a great starter. I judge most Thai places on their Pad Thai. This one is pretty good. 
Seems like the best dishes are probably pineapple curry and pho. 
Staff is extremely friendly. Nice atmosphere.

data.title: Great place and close to the temple
data.text: We've come here several times and I don't write reviews very often but this place is great...love the mango sticky rice!

data.title: Pretty OK Thai food
data.text: While we do not live in Utah, Bangkok Garden is one place where we usually eat one night while visiting Ogden. It is a BYOB place. On this visit, the calamari was among the best we have had. Our other dishes were mediocre, but we travelled to Thailand last year, so I am sure our standards are now much higher. I will probably order from their Chinese offerings on my next trip. From the restaurant we were able to walk to the Courthouse Square for the Ogden Christmas lights. !

data.title: Amazing Thai food!
data.text: All the food is amazing!  We absolutely love the shrimp tempura for an appetizer.  May is the most amazing server there.

data.title: Great curry
data.text: Inexpensive food that is served quickly. We love to go for lunch and get the 2 Fer specials. Not great ambiance but the food makes up for that

data.title: Good Pho
data.text:
I always eat Pho when I go there. Price is good, service is good, restaurant is clean and Pho is delicious ^^
It is also very convenient because they keep store open until dinner.

data.title: Great Thai Food
data.text: Have eaten at Bangkok Garden for years, and have enjoyed the newer version of it twice now. This week my wife and I decided to get something different than our favorite curries (just to change it up). She had Tom Ka soup and I have Bangkok Garden Stir Fried meal. They were excellent! As you know it is sometimes a let down to try something other than your favorite. Not this time!

data.title: Glad we stopped!!
data.text: I have never posted for a restaurant but this one is fabulous. The yellow curry has a wonderful taste. The tempura vegetables are soooo good. I'm waiting now for the mango sticky rice for dessert but couldn't wait to post a review. Service was great as well. I highly recommend!!

data.title: Fresh and delicious
data.text: We started going here as part of Restaurant Week, but we now go just whenever.  The selections are wonderful, the place is clean and attractive, and the service is cheerful and attentive but not overbearing.  There are few places where everything on the menu is wonderful, and when you leave you feel not heavy but healthy.  The dishes are tasty with lots of varied and wonderful tastes throughout.  A must visit when in Ogden.

data.title: Avoid it!
data.text: Found black hair on our food.  The bread on the sandwich was also molded.  That is how the day started, and I am afraid I won't be going back there to eat ever again.  Times before that weren't stellar, but they were never as bad as the last time.

data.title: Lots of favorite dishes here!
data.text:
My family loves this swanky little treasure hidden just off 25th Street in Ogden.  Their dishes are prepared fresh and the presentation doesn't disappoint.  The staff is friendly and accommodating.  We've eaten in a lot and on busy nights have done take out as well.  The food is always savory, tasty and good.  They also have a daily lunch special.

Our family favorites: appetizers - Bangkok Egg Roll, Fresh Spring Roll & Golden Shrimp.  Main dishes:  Pad Thai, Drunken Noodles, Thai Red Curry & Ginger Chicken, Soups: Tom Ka Chicken & Wonton Soup

data.title: My Favorite
data.text: The Pad See Ewe is my favorite dish here and my kids love it too. A couple more of my favorites are the Green curry and pine Apple fried rice. They are always consistently good and we frequent here often.

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: the food is great. If you have special food requests they always hook you up! Food allergies, gluten free, vegetarian and vegan friendly!they are also awesome with take out.

data.title: Great hole in the wall
data.text:
This place was amazing. Great food, fast service and clean. We got veggie tempera which was a great way to start our meal. I ordered the fried rice and my hubby got the stir fry. Both very good. Best part they kept my water glass full. That's says a lot because I drink a ton of water.

Must try.
